thread.title: BRIEF-United Continental Holdings Continues To Expect First-Quarter 2018 Consolidated Passenger Unit Revenue To Be Flat To Up 2.0 Percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Continental Holdings Continues To Expect First-Quarter 2018 Consolidated Passenger Unit Revenue To Be Flat To Up 2.0 Percent
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - United Continental Holdings Inc:
* UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS INC - CONTINUES TO EXPECT FIRST-QUARTER 2018 CONSOLIDATED PASSENGER UNIT REVENUE TO BE FLAT TO UP 2.0 PERCENT
* UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS INC - FEBRUARY 2018 CONSOLIDATED TRAFFIC (REVENUE PASSENGER MILES) INCREASED 5.7 PERCENT
* UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS INC - ‍UAL’S FEBRUARY 2018 CONSOLIDATED TRAFFIC (REVENUE PASSENGER MILES) INCREASED 5.7 PERCENT​
* UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS INC - ‍UAL’S FEBRUARY 2018 CONSOLIDATED LOAD FACTOR INCREASED 1.4 POINTS COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017​
* UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS INC - FEBRUARY 2018 CONSOLIDATED CAPACITY (AVAILABLE SEAT MILES) INCREASED 3.8 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
